The pickup and future models from the new family will be…

title: Australia's central bank cuts rates to two-year low of 3.60%
summary: The Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) has reduced its benchmark cash rate by 0.25% to 3.60%, a two-year low, attributing the decision to moderating inflation and a softening labor market. While the RBA anticipates core inflation to settle within its 2% to 3% target range, even...
fullContent: The Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) has reduced its benchmark cash rate by 0.25% to 3.60%, a two-year low, attributing the decision to moderating inflation and a softening labor market. While the RBA anticipates core inflation to settle within its 2% to 3% target range, even with gradual policy easing, it signaled caution regarding further rate cuts.

title: Fed Chair Search Expands to Include Three New Names
summary: Federal Reserve vice chairs Michelle Bowman and Philip Jefferson, as well as Dallas Fed President Lorie Logan are under consideration to serve as chair of the central bank when the position opens next year, according to administration officials.
fullContent: Federal Reserve vice chairs Michelle Bowman and Philip Jefferson, as well as Dallas Fed President Lorie Logan are under consideration to serve as chair of the central bank when the position opens next year, according to administration officials. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent will interview additional candidates in the coming weeks, and President Donald Trump is expected to make his final announcement in the fall, said the officials. Bloomberg’s Balazs Penz reports.

title: Hong Kong Ballet and top British choreographer break new ground in Venice
summary: On June 24, at the Biennale Danza in Venice, Italy, a new work was unveiled by acclaimed British choreographer Sir Wayne McGregor who, as it happens, is also the artistic director of the international contemporary dance festival. His piece is called On the Other Earth.
fullContent: On June 24, at the Biennale Danza in Venice, Italy, a new work was unveiled by acclaimed British choreographer Sir Wayne McGregor who, as it happens, is also the artistic director of the international contemporary dance festival. His piece is called On the Other Earth. No dancers were physically present. It takes place within a cylinder, four metres (13 feet) high with an eight-metre diameter, encircled by the world’s first 360-degree stereoscopic LED cinematic screen. The immersive installation...

title: PG Electroplast shares jump 6% after 35% crash. Time to sell the rise or buy?
summary: PG Electroplast shares rebounded after a sharp decline triggered by lowered FY26 revenue growth guidance and promoter selling. Long-term investors are bottom fishing, while analysts suggest caution, citing high inventory and weak momentum.
fullContent: PG Electroplast shares rebounded after a sharp decline triggered by lowered FY26 revenue growth guidance and promoter selling. Long-term investors are bottom fishing, while analysts suggest caution, citing high inventory and weak momentum. Nuvama reduced its FY27 growth estimate and target price, favoring Amber and Syrma SGS in the EMS sector.

title: SPJ True Realtyy to invest Rs 500 cr on new commercial project in Gurugram
summary: SPJ True Realtyy plans a significant commercial venture. The company will invest Rs 500 crore in Gurugram. The project named 'Vedatam' will feature shops and service apartments. Sector 14 is the location for this development.
fullContent: SPJ True Realtyy plans a significant commercial venture. The company will invest Rs 500 crore in Gurugram. The project named 'Vedatam' will feature shops and service apartments. Sector 14 is the location for this development. Pankaj Jain highlights the area's untapped retail potential. The SPJ Group, with interests in diverse sectors, backs this real estate endeavor.

title: Australia casino operator Star revives 50% asset sale to HK investors
summary: Australian casino operator Star Entertainment has salvaged a deal to sell a half-stake in its Brisbane resort to Hong Kong-based Far East Consortium and Chow Tai Fook Enterprises. The A$53 million deal provides crucial financial relief for Star, which faced potential collapse...
fullContent: Australian casino operator Star Entertainment has salvaged a deal to sell a half-stake in its Brisbane resort to Hong Kong-based Far East Consortium and Chow Tai Fook Enterprises. The A$53 million deal provides crucial financial relief for Star, which faced potential collapse due to regulatory pressures and economic challenges. Star's shares surged 32% following the announcement.

title: Soybean Futures Fall After Trump Extends Trade Truce With China
summary: Soybean prices fell back below $10 a bushel, as traders saw news of an extended US-China trade truce as likely delaying major grain-purchasing deals between the nations until late this year.
fullContent: Soybean prices fell back below $10 a bushel, as traders saw news of an extended US-China trade truce as likely delaying major grain-purchasing deals between the nations until late this year.
